---
project:
  type: website
  output-dir: _site

website:
  title: "Building Neural Networks in Rust"
  # This stops "Building Neural Networks in Rust" from prefixing the tab title
  title-prefix: false 
  navbar:
    left:
      - text: "Home"
        file: README.md
    right:
      - icon: github
        href: https://github.com/yourusername/yourrepo

format:
  html:
    embed-resources: true
    self-contained-math: true
    # This sets the exact text for the browser tab
    pagetitle: "Building Neural Networks in Rust" 
    theme: 
        dark: darkly
        light: flatly
    toc: true
    toc-location: left
    toc-depth: 5
    code-copy: true
    highlight-style: github
    html-math-method: mathjax
    include-in-header:
      - text: |
          <style>
          .quarto-color-scheme-toggle {
            display: flex !important;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            min-width: 120px;
          }
          /* We will leave the 'content' empty and let JS handle it */
          #quarto-theme-text {
            font-size: 0.9rem;
          }
          </style>
    include-after-body:
      - text: |
          <script>
          document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            const toggle = document.querySelector('.quarto-color-scheme-toggle');
            if (!toggle) return;

            // Create a span to hold our text
            const textSpan = document.createElement('span');
            textSpan.id = 'quarto-theme-text';
            toggle.appendChild(textSpan);

            function updateText() {
              const isDark = document.body.classList.contains('quarto-color-scheme-dark') || 
                             document.body.classList.contains('quarto-dark');
              textSpan.textContent = isDark ? 'Dark Mode' : 'Light Mode';
            }

            // Initial check
            updateText();

            // Watch for changes to the body class
            const observer = new MutationObserver(updateText);
            observer.observe(document.body, { attributes: true, attributeFilter: ['class'] });
          });
          </script>

render:
  - README.md
---

{{< include README.md >}}
